predicate.note: Frames file for 'salve' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment.

role.descr: salve, thing that makes the pain go away

example.name: the one example
example.text: On Saturday night, quite a few of the boys in green and gold salted away successes [*-1] to salve the pain of past and, no doubt, future droughts.
example.arg: [*-1] -> quite a few of the boys in green and gold
the pain of past and, no doubt, future droughts
